item.title: European Powers Sign Limited Agreement on Ukraine Ceasefire Amid Deep Political Divisions
item.description: The article from mpr21 discusses the signing of the so-called 'Paris Agreement' by the so-called 'coalition of volunteers,' purportedly aimed at providing security and economic guarantees to Ukraine. ...

item.title: Geopolitical Reflections on the Western Hemisphere and Global Power Shifts
item.description: In this essay, Juan Manuel Grijalvo explores how geopolitics, once an academic discipline and strategic game for elites, has entered popular discourse. He begins by tracing the origins of geopolitical...
